title: Curried chicken salad in a flash
ingredients: ['800g ready-cooked chicken, shredded', '2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped', '8 tablespoons mayonnaise', '8 tablespoons chopped apple', '8 tablespoons chopped celery', '4 tablespoons chopped onion', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste']
